section.title: Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Interfaces.IEvaluator Interface Reference

para.para: The ILuthCompilerService is to only perform static analysis of source code. One should never execute the source code which is being analyzed. However, for testing purposes it can be useful to see if one's logic for parsing expressions evaluates properly. And so, for testing only, the IEvaluator exists. Again, the ILuthCompilerService should NEVER execute source code which it is analyzing. Only perform static analysis of source code.

section.section:
Detailed Description
The ILuthCompilerService is to only perform static analysis of source code. One should never execute the source code which is being analyzed. However, for testing purposes it can be useful to see if one's logic for parsing expressions evaluates properly. And so, for testing only, the IEvaluator exists. Again, the ILuthCompilerService should NEVER execute source code which it is analyzing. Only perform static analysis of source code.
